special_text:
[i]“I have found dignity, not in the cities, but in the jungle. I have found meaning in the hunt.”
–Kraven the Hunter[/i]
Mill three cards. When you do, you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.
Until end of turn, you may cast creature spells from your graveyard. [i](You still pay their costs. Timing rules still apply.)[/i]
​
